recommendation: On 14 December 2017, the Commission recommended to the Director of Civil Aviation that he consult with the original equipment manufacturer when considering a modification or supplemental type certificate which, if approved, could result in any aircraft being used in a way that is significantly different from that which the manufacturer originally modelled and used as the basis for determining component fatigue lives and the aircraft maintenance programme
safety_issue: Aircraft design organisations did not have to consider whether proposed major modifications to an aircraft would significantly alter the use of the aircraft or adversely affect the service life of any component.
